name: lizjones
text: I think there was a Ramona about this...

name: saulbellow
text: Which one was ugly?  Ramona or Beezus?

name: tekende
text: Henry Huggins, actually. It was kind of a weird side plot. Ramona and Ribsy end up kind of saving the day as a team.

name: saulbellow
text:
I'm sorry it took you five months to go to the library and read every Ramona book in order to respond to that.

I'm sorry.

name: digdugz
text: Man the "saddest thing" strips are pure genius.

name: billyamericana
text: A comment left by billyamericana was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by n00b, relaxing, mortshire, bug, stoned_lightning)

name: notself
text: This might indeed be the actual saddest thing

name: budenhagen
text:
Indeed, of all the saddest things so far, this is totally the saddest saddest thing.

As is my tendency to repeat actions in Achewood, I hope to God my first daughter isn't ugly.

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mustconcentrate, nutmeg, alejandroadam)

name: djwhiterabbit
text: i politely disagree.

name: amynoyes
text: A comment left by amynoyes was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by CygnusX-1, jhunt, bug, mustconcentrate, GrooveHolmes, mistlethrush, fmercury, Magb, killerlimpet, stoned_lightning, gkiyo, joamiq)

name: greenkoolayd
text: you take your empathy elsewhere, heifer.

name: bookofsand
text: Why does Philippe keep asking this question?!

name: slab64
text: He ought to know by now.

name: tekende
text: Who needs a house out in Hackensack

name: stereo
text: SPONGEBOB SQUAREPANTS

name: tekende
text: What the fuck

name: slab64
text: You guys went in two different directions there, despite having strikingly similar avicons.

name: snatch22
text: He wants to be a tough guy.

name: relaxing
text: A little otter's got a lot to remember!

name: gussiejives
text: One thing is for sure: Lie Bot is probably not the best one to answer it.

name: joamiq
text: Philippe is five.

name: epicurus
text: but I still think the retard with the egg was the saddest. Maybe I am biased?

name: luckypyjamas
text: agreed

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Why would you be biased? Is one of your relatives a retard with an egg?

name: epicurus
text: Because... I was the egg .

name: boredom_man
text: Nooooooooo!

name: epicurus
text:
God that is scary with your dead band teacher avatar.

The voice comes from the bullet hole.

name: tombsgrave
text: I tell this one allllll the time.

name: boredom_man
text: I tell this to my teenage son and he just kind of looks at me funny. I need a daughter.

name: tekende
text:
The saddest thing is a teenage boy who is told by his own father that he will never be a talented rock star.

And then the father opens the front door, and on the porch is the boy's guitar case with all of his Hot Topic T-shirts in it.

name: deancain29
text: Best ever.

name: achewoodno1fan
text: OMG IM CRYING

name: divot
text: Man, I think this is the only strip I have the alt text memorised for. It is: They have this conversation over an empty kitchen table.

name: shogun
text: It's 'across' and 'breakfast table', specifically.

name: gussiejives
text: A little white suitcase....

name: joeyramoney
text: this is the first achewood i ever read.

name: pitseleh
text: Still my favorite Achewood strip!!! I <3 Philippe. I want more Philippe and Lie Bot action!

name: envika
text: whoa, let's not get carried away.

name: mcwee
text: Mr. Onstad, this is your finest moment.  You are truly a monster, and I love you for it.

name: norrin
text: I thought it was kind of sad after the first part, but the suitcase ending made it for me.

name: molesticide
text:
two thigns:

1) i read this as lie bot telling philipe the saddest thing, then waiting for his reaction, seeing that it is not horrified enough, then adding to the original lie (if indeed it is such) in order to draw even more horror from the poor young otter.

2) the detail of it being a white suitcase is AWESOME

3) i mistyped 'things' as 'thigns' and 'three' as 'two.'

WHISKEY

name: xi
text:
Nonono, the pause was for dramatic effect, allowing Philippe to fully imagine the tragic picture he paints, holding his breath for the final blow.

And by the way this is completely the saddest thing ever and no one should say otherwise.

name: woodenteeth
text: chubby for the forth thing that didn't get a number. probably because it was more important the all the rest.

name: laikalost
text: Is it silly that this strip caused my throat to tighten up a bit?  Or does Achewood have this effect on others as well?

name: lamelliform
text:
I have to admit that I'm feeling a little weepy now. Misty-eyed, even.


I think I need a drink.

name: deusoma
text: Are you going to weep the Weepy-Weep Way?

name: shoinan
text: I love these strips. Phillipe's expression of angst and trepidation at the addendum to Lie Bot's tale in the third panel is priceless.

name: changuitotuerto
text: Am I the only one who doesn't go crazy for re-run strips?

name: deusoma
text: This isn't a re-run, it's a running gag. The first time he asked Lie Bot what the Saddest Thing was, he gave a different answer.

name: swatson
text: wait...when asked this question, why doesn't Lie Bot lie?

name: bixschmix
text: It is a lie... there are sadder things still.

name: charchar
text: Like two pikachu fighting each other when Team Rocket's still on the loose... Or an eyeball that will spend all day looking out a screen at other people's laughing faces and never read the joke...

name: snowman
text: I'm feeling really dumb that I...don't... totally get this strip. Did the little girl run away? If so, why didn't she take the suitcase? I'm sure I am going to punch myself in the neck when someone explains this...

name: clockworkorange
text: Her parents have packed all her things because they're throwing her out of the house. Because she's ugly.

name: snowman
text:
I just punched myself in the neck.

No, but really, thanks. I feel like an idiot, and this strip is way better now. What is the matter with me...

name: akarroa
text: Sadder than marrying a pregnant flower that is about to die?

name: aparrish
text: Lie Bot Leans In Too Far

name: i_love_kate
text: Chubby. Would Look At Again.

name: redion
text: this might be better than the original. maybe. how do we measure this?
